tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: After visiting so many Gynaecs I finally found the right fit for me. She is gentle, soft spoken, positive and has a very calm and sobering demeanor. She will explain everything at length to make sure the patient is satisfied with the knowledge and can make and informed decision accordingly. She is friendly, warm and not the kind of doctor who would make you jump through hoops and get extra unnecessary tests done even if they are not required. I would highly recommend going to Dr Shweta Raje for her unmatched expertise as well as her humbling human nature.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy care and management,Pregnancy Tests,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Normal Delivery,
review: I am highly satisfied with my experience with Dr. Shweta. She and her qualified team maintained a very amicable attitude right from our first visit. I am grateful to her for easing my pregnancy jitters and patently answering all my questions throughout the 9 months. I would highly recommend Dr. Shweta and Womens Hospital for their services.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

review:
Dr.Swati Raje explained to me in an excellent way about the care I have to take post my surgery.
She gave me confidence and assurance that there was nothing to worry in the future regarding this health issue. 
My fears and tension surrounding this health issue have been completely erased from my mind. 
I am very fortunate to have been under her treatment. 
I and my family are very thankful to Dr.Swati Raje.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: My session with Dr. Shweta was a wonderful experience. From the time I stepped into her consulting room till I left she was very sweet, listening, explaining, reassuring, and even though there were many patients outside she never rushed with anything. Every doubt of mine was clarified with ease and I was told I could connect with her anytime if there was any problem. Very calm, pleasant and confident is how I can describe Dr. Shweta Raje.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
The doctor explained the issue in a very calm and friendly manner. She put my fears to rest. My gynac had suggested that I get my uterus removed. To which I don't agree, as I am only 31 years old and would like to have another child.

Dr. Shweta is like an angel, her confidence comes from years of practice which makes me have complete faith in her. I am not scared to go under the knife, if she is the surgeon.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I and my husband visited Dr Sweta Raje for counselling about family planning. As I was not able to conceive, there were few issues in the reports that suggested unovulation. After a year of medication, she suggested us to opt for follicular scan when the reports seemed bit better and told us to try for 3 months. She was so friendly and positive that we never got disappointed and were always in a good hope. And finally we got the results within a month of the follicular study and I conceived. She is very patient and friendly and very approachable. Just need to have faith in her treatment and you are sure to get the result. ! Little higher on expense but definitely worth the wait and money !

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: *** ****** ******* *** ***** ** ** ********* She saw the ultrasound report and based all her advice on that without acknowledging the other problems I was having. I even asked her if I could have a UTI and she responded with "no just drink plenty of water". Two weeks later I discovered a full blown UTI. She came highly recommended and I thought I was in safe hands but I had to go to two other doctors after seeing her. She prescribed hormonal medicine without either putting to rest my concerns or explaining the side effects to me. This is after I had waited for over an hour to meet her, despite having booked an appointment. This happened earlier this year, I have been lazy to report her. But truly would not recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
For the first time I met such a sweet and kind doctor in my life, I have gone through many of the doc's, but she was the best of all,she is a very straight forward doctor, who never ever keeps a blindfold to the patient, secondly she is very friendly by nature, she always carries a smile on the face and politeness in the talks,while talking to a patient, Infact evryone.  I had a dermoid in the right ovary,which was removed by Dr.shweta Raje. Everything went very smoothly and I was discharged next day itself. I suggest if any kind of gynac related problem occurs in the women, one must approach Dr shweta Raje,for sure.she is too good.
 
Thank you Dr.shweta Raje

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Shweta Raje is so incredibly kind. Her face is warm and smiling. She explained everything about my condition and my options, patiently and without any irritation when i asked the same questions again. She also took into consideration my anxieties and requests. She is superb at her job, there‚Äôs no doubt. What makes her excellent is her grace and kindness. I highly recommend Dr. Raje and the Women‚Äôs Hospital to every woman. They understand you and what you are going through, physically and emotionally.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
This hospital is not a hospital! It‚Äôs like a resort! I‚Äôve been going here for years. The staff is so polite and courteous, their doctors are fantastic and always available to answer all doubts and put fears to rest. They will spoil you rotten with their amazing coffee and offer you their fantastic home made lunch if you happen to be there that time. The place is beautifully done and run - they make a doctor visit an experience to look forward to! 
My favourite part is that it is a hospital is run by women, for women and with so much compassion. 
Dr. Raje is comforting, kind and always accessible. She is concerned and will always be honest with you but never imposing and will put you at ease. 
I give this place and the doctors here a 11/10!
